snippet: Gov. Bob McDonnell signed a bill requiring a woman seeking an abortion to undergo an abdominal ultrasound first, making Virginia the eighth state to have such a requirement.
abstract: Virginia Gov Bob McDonnell signed a bill requiring a woman seeking an abortion to undergo an abdominal ultrasound first, making it the eighth state to have such a requirement.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Bob McDonnell signed a bill requiring a woman seeking an abortion to undergo an abdominal ultrasound first, making Virginia the eighth state to have such a requirement.
